body:
# Middleware

## Usage

It's a RubyOnRails 3 website. Just clone it and start the hacking.

***

## News / Updates

No news/updates at the moment

## Brainstorming / Features

* Reactive implementation of a web wizard using ajax
* Fluid layouts are cool
* Search field with dynamic loading
* Responsive and context aware layouts

## Technologies considerations

Just read the code.

## Authors and Contributors
* [Alessandro Molari](http://molarialessandro.info)
tagline: Example of a reactive and ajax-powered website, also demonstrating new web technologies
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Reactive-website-example
